```{r setup}
# libraries
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  devtools::load_all()
  library(xcms)
  # library(IPO2)
})

# parallel processing
doParallel::registerDoParallel(parallel::detectCores() - 1)
register(BiocParallel::DoparParam(stop.on.error = FALSE))
```

# Data Import

```{r}
files <- 
  list.files(
    system.file("extdata", package = "IPO2"), 
    pattern = "01|02", 
    full.names = TRUE
  )

raw_data <- MSnbase::readMSData(files = files, mode = "onDisk")
```

# Optimize Peak Picking

```{r}
# cleanup
unlink(
  paste0(
    system.file("scratch", package = "IPO2"), 
    c("/centwave_contours", "/log.txt")
  ), 
  recursive = TRUE
)

a <- optimize_centwave(
  raw_data = raw_data, 
  plot_dir = system.file("scratch", package = "IPO2"), 
  log_file = paste0(system.file("scratch", package = "IPO2"), "/log.txt")
)
```
